entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
